name: Go to MyTasks page and create tasks -- @1.3
fullName: Create tasks: Go to MyTasks page and create tasks

steps.name: Given I am logged in with "sudip_pudasaini@hotmail.com" and password "assessmentqa"
And I land on my tasks page
And tasks input field is displayed
And create a task button is displayed

When I type "Tasks with 250 characters: This is the task with long characters and is about 250 char limit. Character Counter is a 100% free online character count calculator that's simple to use. Sometimes users prefer simplicity over all of the detailed writing." in tasks input field
And click on the add button
Then I should see the task getting added in the list

parameters.name: text
parameters.value: Tasks with 250 characters: This is the task with long characters and is about 250 char limit. Character Counter is a 100% free online character count calculator that's simple to use. Sometimes users prefer simplicity over all of the detailed writing.
